function.name: FormatString
function.description: Format a string. Placeholder syntax in format string: '{' to begin placeholder, optional parameter-index with | as seperator, description and '}' to close the placeholder. Example: {0|.1f}

arguments.name: formatString
arguments.description: FormatString with placeholder to be formatted

arguments.name: args
arguments.description: Argument to format the placeholder in formatString
